actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Freedom of Information Act to exempt naval nuclear propulsion information from disclosure in the absence of a finding that such disclosure will not be inimical to the interests of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Freedom of Information Act to exempt naval nuclear propulsion information from disclosure unless the Secretary of Defense and the Administrator of the Energy Research and Development Administration determine that such disclosure would not be inimical to the interests of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Freedom of Information Act to exempt naval nuclear propulsion information from disclosure in the absence of a finding that such disclosure will not be inimical to the interests of the United States.
